Try to organize it in the most comfortable way for you: soon there will be a lot of important emails with tasks, information about new courses or company news. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every day more and more cool testers join Quality Engineering; thanks to our colleagues' efforts we have a lot to share! How to stay up to date?
